member.name: T:LoginSystemOlivia.Password
member.summary:
Password Class The password must meet the following strength requirements: (1) Minimum 8 characters (2) Maximum 16 characters (3) Have at least one upper case (A - Z) character (4) Have at least one lower case (a - z) character (5) Have at least one number(0 - 9) (6) Have at least one symbol or special character from this list: ~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + - = { } | [ ] \ : " ; ' < > ? , . / (7) Must not contain whitespace such as spaces or tabs (8) Must be free of consecutive identical characters
Any password entered by the user must conform to the requirements above.
